paragraphs.title: Input is a text file
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from operator import add

# Read data
input = sc.textFile("file:///README.md")

# MapReduce
counts = input.flatMap(lambda x: x.split(' ')).map(lambda x: (x, 1)).reduceByKey(lambda x,y:x+y)

# Output
output = counts.collect()
for (word, count) in output:
    print("%s: %i" % (word, count))
